mapper.select: SELECT SUM(1) OVER(PARTITION BY NULL) AS TOTAL_RECORD_COUNT, TB.* FROM ( SELECT b.AGENT_CODE, a.SCH_CODE, a.SEND_MSGSEQ, c.SCH_MESSAGE, c.SCH_FONTTYPE, a.MSG_SEND, a.MSG_SENDREGDATE, a.msg_recCheck, a.MSG_RECUPDATE FROM TB_SENDMESSAGEINFO a , TB_AGENTINFO b, TB_SCHEDULEINFO c WHERE b.AGENT_USEYN ='Y' AND a.AGENT_CODE = b.AGENT_CODE AND c.SCH_CODE = a.SCH_CODE AND a.AGENT_CODE = #{agentCode} order by a.SEND_MSGSEQ asc ) TB ORDER BY TB.SEND_MSGSEQ DESC limit #{firstIndex} , #{recordCountPerPage}
